content: Phase 1: Install Node.js 22+ and verify installation
Phase 1: Install Moltbot globally via npm
Phase 1: Create POC test script to verify Moltbot can start and serve UI
Phase 1: Implement reverse proxy (HTTP + WebSocket) in backend
Phase 1: Verify POC - Moltbot UI loads through proxy
Phase 2: Build React setup page with provider selection
Phase 2: End-to-end testing with Testing Agent
